title: VegiBrunch
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar
description: Vegetarian brunch buffet that takes place every third Saturday of the month at the pub Hobo in the cultural center Kulturfabrik Lseke - check the website for dates. Cold breakfast items such as different in-house-made spreads/rolls and salads are served from 11am. At 12:15 there are 2-3 different warm dishes served. Usually everything is vegan and vegetarian items are clearly labelled. You also get a choice of coffee, different kinds of tea, soy milk, cow's milk and juices. As of April 2013, the cost is 4 Euros, all you can eat.
